title: UPDATE: 7-year-old boy shot at south side apartment complex upgraded to stable condition
content:
TUCSON -
TUCSON (KVOA) -- Tucson Police say the 7-year-old boy who was shot in the back at an apartment complex on the south side Wednesday afternoon is out of surgery and is now listed in stable condition.
The shooting happened at around 4:30 p.m. at Rancho Del Mar apartments located on south Campbell Avenue near Bilby Road.
The boy was in critical condition when he was taken to the hospital. According to police, his condition has since improved.
Police say one person has been detained in connection to the shooting.
No other details are being released at this time.
The investigation is ongoing.
Stay with News 4 Tucson on air, online and on your mobile device for updates.
